title: 无法使用指令
author: mcmyu_s
txt_content: 用tpa和sethome还有back都显示没有权限，op可以用，怎么办

replies.author: fghrsh
replies.txt_content:
- essentials.sethome
    - essentials.sethome.bed
    - essentials.sethome.multiple
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
把上面权限给玩家用户组

replies.author: mcmyu_s
replies.txt_content:
fghrsh 发表于 2015-10-4 15:00
- essentials.sethome
    - essentials.sethome.bed
    - essentials.sethome.multiple
怎么给啊

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content:
首先不知道你玩家进来是在哪个用户组里面的！/list 可以查看（假如是bulid）
知道了以后再用指令给权限组权限。
/mangaddp xxx yyy ＝ 给用户组xxx添加yyy权限
/mangaddp bulid essentials.sethome
/mangaddp bulid essentials.sethome.bed
/mangaddp bulid essentials.sethome.multiple
/mangaddp bulid essentials.tpa
/mangaddp bulid essentials.tpaccept
/mangaddp bulid essentials.tpahere
/mangaddp bulid essentials.tpdeny
/mangaddp bulid essentials.back
/mangaddp bulid essentials.back.ondeath
以上是我的一家之言，个人经历，希望可以帮到你！可以给一个最佳回答、
